itemtemplate.name: Hellfire %name%
itemtemplate.text: This weapon is fashioned from infernal iron and traced with veins of hellfire that shed dim light in a 5-foot-radius. Any humanoid killed by an attack made with this weapon has its soul funneled into the River Styx, where it's reborn instantly as a lemure devil.
itemtemplate.source: Baldur's Gate: Descent Into Avernus p. 223
